#summary Howto change your keyboard layout
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

This will change the keyboard layout of the slideout keyboard to QWERTY, QWERTZ, AWERTY, or anything else that is available.


= What to do =
  * Open the Root Explorer
  * Goto /system/usr/keylayout
  * Rename eve_qwerty.kl-yourlanguage to eve_qwerty.kl (Overwrite the existing file)

= If your layout is not available =
  Please copy the eve_qwerty.kl from an official rom in your language. Then please fill an issue and attach this file, so we can make it available to everyone
